app.title: AI Shield - Threat Detection System

home.title: Network Traffic Analysis
home.subtitle: Upload CSV files containing network traffic data for AI-powered threat detection and attack classification

binaryThreat.title: Binary Threat Detection
binaryThreat.description: Advanced ensemble model (ANN + LSTM) identifies attacks vs normal traffic with high accuracy

multiClass.title: Multi-Class Classification
multiClass.description: 14 attack types including DDoS, Port Scan, Brute Force, and more for granular threat analysis

selfHealing.title: Self-Healing Actions
selfHealing.description: Automated response recommendations: service restarts, IP blocking, and admin alerts

security.title: Data Privacy & Security
security.description: All uploaded data is processed securely and deleted after analysis. No sensitive information is stored permanently.
